content:
WasmCon 2024 was last week! Unfortunately I wasn't able to attend, but videos are now posted so I just started catching up with what I missed: https://www.youtube.com/@LinuxfoundationOrg/videos

The Linux Foundation
The Linux Foundation is a nonprofit consortium dedicated to fostering the growth of Linux and collaborative software development. Founded in 2000, the organization sponsors the work of Linux creator Linus Torvalds and promotes, protects and advances the Linux operating system and collaborative software development by marshaling the resources of its members and the open source community. The Linux Foundation provides a neutral forum for collaboration and education by hosting Collaborative Projects, Linux conferences including LinuxCon, and generating original research and content that advances the understanding of Linux and collaborative software development. More information can be found at www.linuxfoundation.org.
hard to pick one to watch first but I went with YouTube - - YouTube - two excellent demos by @Calvin Prewitt and @Mendy Berger

for posterity, here is a playlist of just the wasmcon 2024 recordings: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLbzoR-pLrL6o0UD4PoO0H_RnoToEiWBIS

WasmCon 2024
